title: Best of the Program | Guest: Rep. Chris Stewart | 11/11/19
description:
The public hearings start on Wednesday! But while everyone is dead set on Trump and Biden, we’re asking WHY the Democrats suddenly ran toward impeachment (did somebody say “Hail Hydra”). The Senate must start playing offense and expose EVERYTHING. Kanye West might run for president in 2024 – but don’t laugh! He’s serious. All the chaos is bumping right up against the holidays. But Thankfully, CNN has the complete guide to the future impeachment hearings. Rep. Chris Stewart joins to give a firsthand view of the hearings, Schiff’s heavy hand, and the GOP’s plan forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
